Package NameServer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NameServer
    NameServer for managing the active nodes in the network.
    NameServerController
    Class for handling REST API requests.
    Overview:
    /ns_________________________returns a JSON with the status of the name server.
    /ns/nodes___________________returns a JSON with the nodes currently registered.
    /ns/nodes/{nodeId}__________returns a JSON of the node with the given id.
    /ns/nodes/{nodeId}/fail_____deletes the node that failed and notifies the other nodes.
    /ns/files_____________________returns a JSON with all the files in the system (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
    /ns/files/{fileName}________returns the IP of the node that has the file with the given name.
    /ns/files/{fileName}/id_____returns the ID of the node that has the file with the given name.
    NameServerStatusCodes
    Class with a collection of exception classes that can be thrown by the NameServerController.

    note: the following also works!
    NamingServerApp
    Class for launching the Java Spring REST Application.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NameServerStatusCodes.JSONFieldNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a field is missing in the json.
    NameServerStatusCodes.JSONInvalidFormatException
    Exception thrown when a JSON has the wrong format.
    NameServerStatusCodes.NodeAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when the node that has to be created, already exists.
    NameServerStatusCodes.NodeNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when the node that has to be modified or deleted doesn't exist.
